name: Embedded Agile Testing - A Practical Example
tagline: Coders to the left, Testers to the right
body:
***

# Links for the workshop

* [How to setup Chrome Dev Tools](http://embeddedtester.github.io/DevToolsSetup/)
* [Shortcuts for Chrome Dev Tools](http://embeddedtester.github.io/DevToolsShortcuts/)
* [User Stories](http://embeddedtester.github.io/UserStories/)

***

# Feedback 

It would be great if you give feedback after the workshop:
* [Feedback Survey](https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/LQD67KJ)

***

# Learn more

Here are some resources to learn more:

* [Improving Your Productivity With The Chrome DevTools](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kVSo4buDAEE)
* [codecademy](http://www.codecademy.com/learn)
* [CodeSchool](https://www.codeschool.com/?mbsy_source=00a9e084-9249-4258-9154-c9971d8c8d0f&campaignid=2212&mbsy=c7GcN_8)
* [Psychology and Engineering of Testing](http://www.slideshare.net/ilari/psychology-and-engineering-of-testing)
* [What do you mean "Agile Tester"?](https://vimeo.com/111866368)
* [Waiter, There's Test In My Dev](https://vimeo.com/111039383)
* [Agile is Giving Testers More Influence](http://www.infoq.com/news/2015/03/agile-testers-influence)

***
# Usage of the material

Feel free to use the material linked here for yourself or your team. If you decide to use it, it would be great if you can drop us a short message on how you are using the material and give us feedback. Please use the following mail address: EmbeddedTesterWorkshop@gmail.com

We are considering to extend the workshop into a full-day or two day workshop which we would offer commercially. These workshops would include more time for the exercises and additional topics like Test Reporting or how to use git. Send us a message if you are interested: EmbeddedTesterWorkshop@gmail.com

***

# Proposal Video for Let's Test

[Proposal Video on Dropbox](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/16980270/Coders_to_the_left_Lets_Test_Proposal_2015.mov)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
